reviewText: put that on prime please or instant video

Taught me a few more things about the Congo.
Fascinating education for the whole family.
Very educational. Thank you for your prompt delivery.

Great photography, above average sound track, well-written, good narration. Over all, however, the film pales in comparison with NatGeo's "Africa's Thunder River," a far superior film that follows the Zambezi but which sadly isn't yet available on DVD.
